CHARLIEPLEXING¶

CHARLIEPLEXING¶

Charlieplexing is a technique used to drive multiplexed display using the tri state logic of a microcontroller.

SCHEMATIC¶

Charlieplexing vs Multiplexing?¶

Problems with Charlieplexing: - Requirement of tri state logic - Refresh rate - Cannot be used to drive higher number of LEDs - Cannot use LEDs with different forward voltages

Exercise¶

  • Based on the Analog Input change the number of LED which turns on
